title: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: I am unable to understand Bug 8142. There seems to be an issue with the scoped type hierarchy on binary projects.
OB: When I press F4 on a binary project selection, nothing happens.
EB: When I press F4 on a binary project selection, I expect to see a scoped type hierarchy.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open a binary project.
2. Select a file within the binary project.
3. Press F4.
